column4: i don't quite understand apt-get it seems.  i have firefox 3.0.11, and i'd like 3.5.  "sudo apt-get install firefox" tells me "firefox is already the newest version"
thats the newest official release in the release. you need to update your sources. see ubottu
no, you need to the repository for the 3.5 release. its not in the standard repositories yet
